section.title: Description
section.p: Requirement: "Enable Triple'A Plus Design Studio User Guide documentation out of Design Studio so that a user can access to the documentation without having to install Design Studio (HTML format is accepted)."

section.title: FDS Link
section.p: No FDS was needed, as this turned out to be an SR instead of an FR in practice.

section.title: JIRA Issue(s)
section.p: Note that Product Management verbally expressed an interest to have this available for 1.30.6 documentation already if possible, so as it was one of the first developments of DS release 1.40.0, it was exceptionally coded on 1.30.6 already and then merged into 1.40.0 (and is thus available for all future releases as well).

section.title: TDS
section.p: This requirement was implemented by providing a Windows Help .CHM version of the Design Studio End-User documentation.
The DITA Toolkit which we use under the covers for building documentation supports generating the CHM format, so this was a natural fit.
So build process was extended to build CHM from DITA (in addition to already existing Eclipse Help plug-in).
Resulting CHM is distributed and available on distribution disk3, next to the DesignStudio-1.40.0 ZIP.

Third party documentation from Innovations Visual Rule is not available in DITA and thus could not be converted to CHM, and is thus distributed as separate Visual_Rules_Modeling.pdf (as provided by Third party vendor) next to CHM and product.
